title: Python Engineer Manager - Scraper Team - Remote Work | REF281709
description:
Python Engineer Manager - Scraper Team - Remote Work:

At BairesDev, we've been leading the way in technology projects for over 15 years. We deliver cutting-edge solutions to giants like Google and the most innovative startups in Silicon Valley.

Our diverse 4,000+ team, composed of the world's Top 1% of tech talent, works remotely on roles that drive significant impact worldwide.

We are seeking a talented and experienced Python Engineer Manager to lead our Scraper Team. In this role, you will have the unique opportunity to drive the development of a new product, collaborating closely with Product Management, Architects, and the CTO. You will be responsible for building and growing a high-performing team while ensuring the delivery of high-quality software.

What You’ll Do:
  1. Build and grow a talented engineering team by sourcing, selecting, interviewing, and hiring the right candidates.
  2. Collaborate with Product Management to define the product roadmap, MVP, and key metrics.
  3. Work closely with Architects and team leads to define the product's architecture, ensuring scalability and robustness.
  4. Manage the project lifecycle, including driving scrum meetings and ensuring timely delivery of features.
  5. Actively participate in the development and testing of key product features, maintaining a hands-on approach.
What We’re Looking For:
  1. 7+ years of experience in software development and delivery.
  2. 5+ years of experience with Python, with strong expertise in web scraping.
  3. Proven experience in team building, coaching, and collaboration.
  4. A business-oriented mindset with the ability to align technical efforts with company goals and provide visibility into business metrics.
  5. Ability to design end-to-end modular solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing ecosystems.
  6. Expertise in event-driven architecture within AWS (SQS, SNS, ECS, Lambdas).
Bonus Skills:
  1. 2+ years of experience with APIs and REST systems.
How we make your work (and your life) easier:
  1. 100% remote work (from anywhere).
  2. Excellent compensation in USD or your local currency if preferred.
  3. Hardware and software setup for you to work from home.
  4. Flexible hours: create your own schedule.
  5. Paid parental leaves, vacations, and national holidays.
  6. Innovative and multicultural work environment: collaborate and learn from the global Top 1% of talent.
  7. Supportive environment with mentorship, promotions, skill development, and diverse growth opportunities.

Join a global team where your unique talents can truly thrive!

  • Experiência com Unit Tests: Como parte do fluxo de desenvolvimento há a validação de unidades de código em build time.

Disponibilidade para trabalho presencial, na região Central de Curitiba.

Disponibilidade para viagens esporádicas a cidade próximo da capital, em implantações e afins.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Gerente administrativo financeiro
description:
Mas afinal, o que é TOPdesk?

TOPdesk é uma empresa de software e consultoria de origem holandesa. Temos um software para gerenciamento de serviços e, aqui no Brasil, fazemos a comercialização, implantação, suporte e pequenos ajustes na ferramenta. Contamos com mais de 900 colaboradores em 11 países e cerca de 4.000 clientes em todo o mundo. Qualquer empresa que você imaginar tem departamentos de suporte que tratam de questões de dentro da organização ou de seus clientes externos. Essas questões podem ser facilmente registradas e resolvidas com o TOPdesk!

As empresas que procuram uma ferramenta como o TOPdesk são infinitas. De pequenos a grandes clientes, o TOPdesk pode tornar a vida mais fácil e padronizada!

O que você vai fazer?

Como Gerente Administrativo Financeiro, você será o ponto de contato da nossa matriz na Holanda para assuntos financeiros e contábeis. Suas principais responsabilidades serão:

  • Liderar e desenvolver tecnicamente as equipes de Financeiro, Jurídico e Facilities.
  • Garantir processos financeiros e administrativos organizados, com foco em melhorias contínuas.
  • Garantir informações financeiras confiáveis para tomada de decisões estratégicas.
  • Acompanhar e operacionalizar o planejamento orçamentário anual e seu monitoramento mensal.
  • Realizar aprovações de transações bancárias no sistema.
  • Trabalhar com a consultoria legal em questões como procurações, representação legal e processos judiciais/trabalhistas.
  • Revisar documentos jurídicos e financeiros para garantir conformidade com as normas.
  • Enviar documentos contábeis mensais e anuais para a matriz (Holanda) com qualidade e dentro dos prazos.
  • Gerenciar relatórios e KPIs da área para decisões baseadas em dados.
  • Administrar pagamentos de salários e benefícios.
  • Participar do comitê estratégico da empresa, contribuindo com insights e alinhamentos globais.
O que esperamos de você?
  • Formação superior em Administração e/ou áreas correlatas;
  • Experiência sólida em gestão de equipes e processos financeiros;
  • Conhecimento de negócio e tecnologia;
  • Proficiência em Microsoft Excel, desejável conhecimento em Power BI e sistema TOTVS;
  • Capacidade de comunicação e trabalho colaborativo com equipes multidisciplinares;
  • Inglês AVANÇADO (será testado).

O nosso recrutamento é 100% online. Assim que seu currículo for selecionado pelo time de recrutadores, entraremos em contato para agendar uma entrevista.

A primeira entrevista é com o time de RH e a segunda é com a pessoa gestora da vaga.

Nosso processo seletivo dura em torno de 20 dias, desde a primeira entrevista até a contratação.

Se tudo der certo, mês que vem estaremos trabalhando juntos!

O que oferecemos para você crescer e se sentir bem na TOPdesk?
  • Salário compatível com o mercado;
  • Benefícios flexíveis: cartão Flash com R$ 1.079,00 mensais para usar como preferir, sendo R$ 862,00 para alimentação e R$ 217,00 para ajudar com internet e energia;
  • Jornada flexível e modelo híbrido: trabalhe onde preferir, com um dia por semana presencial no escritório;
  • Transporte: reembolso de deslocamento por transporte público no Cartão Flash;
  • Convênio com SESC: a credencial plena garante cultura, lazer e esporte em todas as unidades;
  • Gympass (wellhub): descontos em academias e atividades que fortalecem sua saúde e qualidade de vida;
  • Cuidamos da sua saúde por completo com a assistência médica e odontológica da Porto Seguro, extensiva para sua família, além de seguro de vida Zurich;
  • Parceria com a plataforma de idiomas Rosetta Stone;
  • Educação financeira com a Onze;
  • Auxílio-creche para filhos de 0 a 5 anos;
  • Happy Day: um dia off na semana do seu aniversário para aproveitar com quem você ama;
  • Para os seus dias presenciais, temos uma sala de descompressão equipada com PS5, Nintendo Switch, pebolim, mesa de ping pong e sinuca. Além disso, temos snacks para você fazer um lanchinho enquanto bate um papo com seu colega favorito!

Quer saber mais sobre TOPdesk? Acesse o nosso site!

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Network Solution Architect
description:
4 weeks ago Be among the first 25 applicants

Welcome to 1GLOBAL, a dynamic and innovative force in the intersection of telecommunications and technology. Founded by two visionary technology entrepreneurs, Hakan Koç and Pyrros Koussios, 1GLOBAL is a privately owned company with a clear mission to connect the world, seamlessly. With over 100 million dollars in revenue and being both profitable and cash generative, 1GLOBAL has the ability to fund its massive growth without relying on external funding.

As a global specialty telecommunications provider, 1GLOBAL serves financial institutions, enterprises, mobile network operators, and consumers across 42 countries, offering fully regulated voice, data, and SMS services. As pioneers in the eSIM revolution, we've built a complete ecosystem that drives our growth with partners such as Apple, Palo Alto Networks and Google, while attracting customers like Goldman Sachs, JP Morgan, Revolut, Netflix and Tesla.

Join us at 1GLOBAL and be part of that journey of massive growth, while forming the future of the global communication industry!

The Role

As an Architect inside the Network Engineering department, you will act as a Solution Architect for new products, services and technologies in 1Global, acting as a point of contact towards internal and external customers. Effectively work closely with Product and Marketing, but also with all different technical stakeholders and vendors, in shaping, designing, testing, and implementing new solutions.

The Architect is responsible for leading the requirements analysis process, in close contact with all relevant stakeholders, to a refined and clear scope, allowing a solution to be created, documented and planned to be implemented.

Key Responsibilities

  • Iterates with the customer (internal and external) and other stakeholders to determine the technical requirements, risks, technical impacts, and recommendations
  • Design of new consumer and corporate telecom solutions
  • Collaborates with technical teams in defining reliable, modular, scalable, and customer-centric solutions, as well as planning and reviewing solutions
  • Design and present solutions in documents and workshops. For the solution identifies the impacts, efforts and the resources needed
  • Market prospection of new solutions through elaboration and analysis of Request for Information/Proposal/Quotation processes and negotiation with potential suppliers
  • Follow up of new technology trends in the Telecom industry and identifying interesting solutions for the product portfolio
  • Definition and follow up of company technological evolution roadmaps
  • Documents the existing technology portfolio and proposes recommendations for improvements and / or alternatives
  • Ensure and control quality of documentation execution (HLD's, LLD's, WO's, etc.)
  • Ensure and control implementation quality. Understanding of End to End system testing requirements
  • Ensure the network is compliant with industry standards and regulations
  • Capacity and Performance Analysis, Reporting and Improvement Solution Definition
  • Work on complex solutions that influence the design of current products and addresses design issues for future products or technologies. Enhance, simplify, and optimize existing applications and processes
  • Evolves the engineering maturity to be on par with the non-functional and functional state-of-the-art
  • Communicates transparently to the whole business
  • Reaches out to other teams and works towards alignment and overall continuous improvement

Requirements

Must Have

  • Excellent understanding of Mobile Networks and its architectures
  • Experience with MVNO architecture(s) and landscape. Familiar with roaming environment, including its technical, commercial and regulatory aspects
  • Solid knowledge of networking principles & protocols, including security
  • Experience in network protocols like MAP, CAMEL, SIGTRAN, DIAMETER, SIP
  • Knowledge and experience of OCS and Gy/Sy interfaces
  • Experience with VoLTE and VoWiFi
  • Experience with LTE, 5G, IMS, IP technologies and protocols
  • Familiar with cloud-based solutions and virtualization technologies
  • High Level Designs and Low Level Designs. Experience developing and presenting internal and external documents
  • Experience with 5G Core Mobile Networks
  • Experience with monitoring tools and protocols in Mobile Networks
  • Anticipates problems and addresses them before they cause impact
  • Understands how big-picture goals inform technical details and vice-versa
  • Ability to work in complex environments (multi-cultural/multi-country/geographically distributed teams)
  • High attention to detail. Doesn't leave things to be addressed or left undone
  • Business oriented, capable to engage and discuss with non technical persons in order to create technical requirements
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills
  • English proficiency mandatory, other languages are a plus
  • Degree in Telecom Engineering or Computer Science or equivalent experience

Nice to Have

  • Experience with cloud applications monitoring and analytics is a plus
  • Experience with AI/ML cloud based service assurance is a plus
  • +8 years working on telecoms, designing and implementing mobile core networks

Benefits

Why 1GLOBAL?

  • Growth Opportunities: Advance your career in one of the fastest growing telecommunications companies, expanding over 40% year-on-year under the leadership of successful tech entrepreneurs
  • Major Transaction Exposure: Be in the driver's seat for transactions that will have an impact on the future telco industry
  • Work with a Talented Team: From the Board and the Founders to the Senior Management Team, you will collaborate daily with the most capable and renowned external advisors, and constantly being exposed to talented and driven individuals
  • Dynamic Work Environment: Thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced workplace where innovation is encouraged, and every contribution counts
  • Professional Development: Work alongside industry experts to enhance your skills and knowledge in a cutting-edge field
  • International Experience: Gain opportunities to work in different 1GLOBAL offices around the world as you grow within the company
  • Open Communication Culture: Join a team where your ideas are heard, and open dialogue is encouraged, fostering a supportive and transparent work environment
  • Get Things Done Attitude: Be part of a results-driven team that values efficiency, creativity, and the drive to make a tangible impact in the industry

1GLOBAL is an equal opportunity employer, we value your character as much as your talent. Diversity drives our innovation and we offer a collaborative, dynamic, and international work environment. We are excited for you to join our mission to revolutionise connectivity globally.

Seniority level

Mid-Senior level

Employment type

Full-time

Job function

Information Technology

Industries

Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education

title: Desenvolvedor Fullstack (.NET  Angular) / Pesquisa  Desenvolvimento - Trabalho Remoto | REF264605
description:
Desenvolvedor Fullstack (.NET + Angular) / Pesquisa + Desenvolvimento - Trabalho Remoto:

Há mais de 15 anos, a BairesDev é líder em projetos tecnológicos. Entregamos soluções inovadoras para gigantes como Google e Rolls-Royce e as startups mais inovadoras do Vale do Silício.

Temos uma equipe diversa de mais de 4.000 profissionais formada pelo Top 1% dos talentos de tecnologia do mundo, trabalhando remotamente em cargos de impacto global.

Ao se candidatar para este cargo, você está dando o primeiro passo em um processo que vai além do comum. Nosso objetivo é alinhar suas paixões, habilidades, e expectativas às nossas vagas, colocando você no caminho para desenvolver uma carreira de sucesso excepcional.

Estamos procurando desenvolvedores Fullstack pendentes (.NET + Angular) para se juntar à equipe de Pesquisa e Desenvolvimento (P&D) da BairesDev. Nossa equipe de P&D é a parte essencial de nossas soluções tecnológicas que impulsionam milhões em receitas a cada ano, por isso só contratamos os melhores dos melhores. Nesta equipe, você encontrará muitos desafios diferentes: análise de dados, aprendizado de máquinas, desktop e desenvolvimento web são alguns dos mais relevantes no momento, mas para impulsionar a inovação, você notará que coisas novas estão surgindo a cada dia! A área de P&D é sem dúvida a mais interessante e desafiadora de toda a empresa, e embora a BairesDev seja composta por pessoas realmente talentosas em geral, aqui você encontrará profissionais com ampla experiência e também nível intelectual e criativo, muito acima da média. Queremos que as pessoas aproveitem a viagem. Você está pronto?

Responsabilidades:
  • Arquitetar e desenvolver vários serviços e APIs para o produto Degreed, desenvolvendo, codificando, testando e depurando programas de aplicação de vários graus de complexidade.
  • Tomar decisões arquitetônicas tendo em mente o futuro de um negócio em crescimento.
  • Colaborar com os proprietários dos produtos para garantir que os recursos/mudanças atendam aos requisitos comerciais e cumpram a estratégia Degreed.
  • Trabalhar de perto com projetistas, UX e outros desenvolvedores para obter uma compreensão das novas características, dependências e detalhes técnicos, desenvolvendo e implementando testes de aceitação para garantir que o produto atenda às exigências e expectativas do cliente.
  • Garantir o alto desempenho de todos os sistemas desenvolvidos.
  • Ser capaz de gerenciar seu tempo de forma eficaz para se concentrar na codificação, bem como apoiar os membros juniores.
Oferecemos:
  • Modalidade 100% remota - trabalhe de qualquer lugar.
  • Excelente remuneração em USD ou na sua moeda local, como preferir.
  • Hardware para você trabalhar de casa.
  • Horários flexíveis - faça seu próprio horário.
  • Licença parental remunerada, férias, e feriados nacionais.
  • Ambiente de trabalho inovador e multicultural.
  • Colabore e aprenda com o Top 1% global dos talentos de cada área.
  • Ambiente de apoio com mentoria, promoções, desenvolvimento de habilidades, e diversas oportunidades de crescimento.

Junte-se a uma equipe global onde seus talentos excepcionais podem se destacar!

title: Analista de Preços DSH
description:
Job description

A Volkswagen Group Services tem como objetivo prestar serviços específicos às empresas do Grupo VW, garantindo a excelência em nossas entregas e mantendo o foco nas necessidades estratégicas de cada cliente.

Em 2023 iniciamos nossa operação na América do Sul e estamos em busca de profissionais talentosos e engajados que queiram embarcar nessa jornada conosco.


Main responsibilities

Principais tarefas:

  1. Recebimento da demanda, análise e cálculo do preço da peça e/ou acessório DSH.
  2. Consultar as informações no sistema SAP/ET2000 para efetuar as análises de preços e margens de peça e acessórios DSH.
  3. Alinhamento da informação junto ao fornecedor com os preços e condições de venda, inclusive promocionais.
  4. Gerenciar o Fórum DSH, levando os pontos para aprovação, efetuar o cadastro do preço no sistema e liberar o item para comercialização.
  5. Gerenciar os cronogramas internos para aprovações de propostas comerciais e financeiras junto aos stakeholders.
  6. Atualizar os relatórios gerenciais como KPIs, lista de preços, entre outros.
  7. Gerenciar a lista de preços das peças e/ou acessórios DSH mensalmente.
  8. Controle de relatórios referente aos processos DSH.
  9. Gerenciar os resultados financeiros do Business Pós Vendas e lucratividade da Rede de Concessionários.

Requirements and skills

Requisitos:

  1. Formação superior completa em Administração, Economia, Estatística, Comércio Exterior, Engenharia ou áreas afins.
  2. Inglês intermediário.
  3. Excel Avançado (fórmulas complexas, tabelas dinâmicas, gráficos e manipulação de grandes conjuntos de dados).

Desejável:

  1. Experiência ou background em revenue, management, pricing (por exemplo, conhecimento básico sobre impostos).
  2. Experiência em trade, comércio exterior ou finanças.
  3. Experiência no seguimento automobilistico.
  4. Power Bi Intermediário.
  5. Experiência com Tableaut.
  6. Sistema SAP.

Additional information

Trata-se de uma oportunidade CLT, no formato híbrido, com presença necessária em nossos escritórios, nos bairros do Jabaquara e Morumbi, ou ainda, em São Bernardo do Campo, 3 vezes por semana.

Benefícios:

  • Plano Odontológico Sulamerica
  • Vale Refeição
  • Vale Alimentação
  • Auxílio Creche
  • Programa Bem-Estar
  • Previdência Privada

title: Sr. Technical Program Manager , INTech LATAM
description:
Sr. Technical Program Manager, INTech LATAM

The Amazon International Technology Team is hiring a Senior Technical Program Manager to work in our Sao Paulo dev center in Brazil. Responsibilities include collection of business and systems requirements from internal and external customers, writing specifications, technical design of the solutions/systems, driving project schedules from design to release, technical discussions with the software development team, and managing the production launch. You will lead and coordinate design/implementation efforts between your team and other teams to develop optimal solutions. You will be expected to make appropriate tradeoffs to optimize time-to-market, clearly communicate goals, roles, responsibilities, and desired outcomes to internal cross-functional and remote project teams.

The right candidate will possess a strong program management background, will have demonstrated experience leading medium to large projects, and will have a well-rounded technical background in current software development technologies. You must be able to thrive and succeed in an entrepreneurial environment, and not be hindered by ambiguity or multiple competing priorities. This means you are not only able to develop and drive high-level strategic initiatives but can also roll up your sleeves, dig in, and get the job done. As a TPM, you will anticipate bottlenecks, provide escalation management, anticipate and make tradeoffs, and balance the business needs versus technical constraints. An ability to take large, complex projects and break them down into manageable pieces, develop functional specifications, then deliver them in a successful and timely manner is expected. Maturity, high judgment, negotiation skills, ability to influence, analytical talent, and leadership are essential to success in this role.

BASIC QUALIFICATIONS

- 5+ years of technical product or program management experience
- 7+ years of working directly with engineering teams experience
- 3+ years of software development experience
- 5+ years of technical program management working directly with software engineering teams experience
- Experience managing programs across cross-functional teams, building processes and coordinating release schedules

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

- 5+ years of project management disciplines including scope, schedule, budget, quality, along with risk and critical path management experience
- Experience managing projects across cross-functional teams, building sustainable processes and coordinating release schedules
- Experience defining KPI's/SLA's used to drive multi-million dollar businesses and reporting to senior leadership

title: Grupo QuintoAndar | Senior Software Engineer – Tech Platform
description:
About QuintoAndar
QuintoAndar was born to do something very rewarding: open doors. We opened doors for technology to be part of living. And, through it, we simplify and reduce the bureaucracy of the experience of those looking for a new home. Thus, we became the most valuable proptech in Latin America, leading the real estate market in around six countries and more than 75 cities around the globe.

The first steps in the international market have been taken since we acquired Grupo Navent, which is ranked number 1 in Mexico (Inmuebles24), Argentina (Zonaprop), Peru (Adondevivir & Urbania) and Ecuador (Plusvalia) - among others. And most recently, we launched Benvi, our international brand in Mexico, which comes with our residential rental product and service.

We offer an end-to-end ecosystem to make life easier for those looking to rent or buy a home, sell a property and unlock a transaction. Think of zero paper or bureaucracy: everything happens on a single platform, with transparency and speed alongside incredible human support.

We are currently valued at over $5.1 billion (August 2021) and continue to grow 4x year over year, breaking records.

To make all this happen, we have more than 4,000 talented people, working with cutting-edge technology and best design practices to ensure a seamless experience throughout the sales and rental process, combined with smart financial products. Here you will work with the best professionals in the market, in an environment that breathes innovation, collaboration and high performance.

About Grupo QuintoAndar:

We are Grupo QuintoAndar, the largest real estate ecosystem in Latin America. Guided by a shared purpose of helping people love where they live, we have a diverse portfolio of brands and solutions that cover all stages of the journey of living. We develop technologies and innovations that transform and leverage the whole living experience.

About working at QuintoAndar:

  • Possibility of learning;
  • Opportunity to work in a team that seeks to use the best practices and tools in the market;
  • Work in an informal environment with a horizontal structure;
  • Being part of a team working on a high-impact project that affects the lives of thousands of people.

Location & Remote Work

Our technology team works on the "remote-first" model, which means we are working from home with the possibility of living anywhere in Brazil. We also have the option of using QuintoAndar's offices in São Paulo and Campinas or using partner coworking spaces, both up to twice a week.

Language

This job description is written in English because for that position you will need it for communications with coworkers and suppliers who are from worldwide, for tools and internal materials as well.

Stages of the Selection Process

Our selection process currently lasts an average of 30-40 days, from application to completion of the assessment. Going through:

  • Application
  • Interview with Recruiters
  • Tech Screening
  • Technicals Interviews with Engineering Team
  • Offer

About the Area:

These are the Senior Software Engineer responsibilities at QuintoAndar:

  • Develop independent (micro-)services that address specific solutions;
  • Responsible for the entire lifecycle of their code;
  • Contribute not only with your immediate team’s challenges but with the whole product team by sharing inputs/code/etc;
  • Improve the development experience at QuintoAndar by enhancing development tools, test coverage, and/or code structure;
  • Participate actively in discussions and decisions of software design. Building and helping to create documentations;
  • Create scalable, maintainable and user driven solutions. We use several different technologies: from Java over SQL databases, to Polymer over MongoDB. We also have micro-services written in Java, Python, Node or Clojure, gorgeous PWA experiences in React, complex data flows in Datomic. You don't need to know all these upfront, but we will give you space to learn and improve;
  • Help organize software architecture to harmonically orchestrate our services architecture.

Seniority Level:

We want to have as many talented people as possible in our team. So, although this position is described as “Senior Software Engineer”, you can apply even if you don’t consider yourself as a senior professional yet. It’s important to us to create a qualified talent pool and we will definitely reach out to you if we think you can add to our teams, no matter what seniority level you are today.

What we are looking for:

  • Proficiency in at least one programming language and relational databases;
  • Experience using RESTful APIs;
  • People that are seeking to learn and deliver real impact through high-quality data-driven and structured software, valuing work-life balance;
  • Fluency in Portuguese and knowledge in English - we usually use English to write our code, documentation, tools, reference materials and eventually talk to partners and co-workers from other countries;
  • Excellent English skills (verbal and written) is mandatory.

You'll stand out if you:

  • Know computer theory, including optimization of algorithms and distributed systems;
  • Already developed scalable client-server mobile applications;
  • Have experience with cloud service platforms and its services (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc);
  • Understand how modern CD/CI works;
  • Have some knowledge on containers and container-orchestration (eg. Kubernetes);
  • Know how to test and tune scalability;
  • Understand the work is never done; we are always taking care and evolving our services.

Important:

  • Our selection process starts with the application! If you are truly interested in joining our team, make sure to put in extra effort at this stage. We review all candidates individually and provide feedback even to those who do not proceed in the process;
  • All communication is done via email, so be attentive to our messages and whitelist the @quintoandar.com.br domain to prevent our emails from going to spam.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary package;
  • Bonus
  • Meal allowance;
  • Health plan;
  • Dental plan (optional);
  • Life insurance;
  • Daycare subsidy;
  • Subsidy to sports practicing (Gympass).
  • Extended maternity and paternity leave;
  • Reserved room for breast-feeding;
  • Discount on our parking lot;
  • Language learning support;
  • Free transfer from Vila Madalena and Fradique Coutinho stations to the office;
  • Free bike rack in our parking lot.

Diversity & Inclusion at QuintoAndar
At QuintoAndar, we believe diversity of perspectives and experiences guarantee a differentiated work environment, based on respect and valuing differences. Feel free to declare the information on the registration form. If you are not comfortable answering them, just choose the option "I prefer not to respond". This information helps us create an increasingly inclusive environment and it is used only for this purpose, it is confidential, and it will not impact your performance throughout the hiring process.

Data Protection Policy
The information you provide in the recruitment process form is confidential and stored in a secure environment. We have implemented technical and administrative measures to protect your data. To learn more about how we handle personal data, please visit our Privacy Policy. To exercise your rights regarding your personal data, such as access to data, confirmation of processing, correction of data, anonymization, blocking or deletion, and other rights with the QuintoAndar Group, please contact us through our Customer Service Channel.

title: Customer Support Executive
description:
About RedCloud

RedCloud is leveraging AI-powered technology to break down the barriers to fair and profitable trade in emerging markets.

RedCloud's Intelligent Open Commerce Platform connects FMCG Brands, Distributors, and Local Merchants on a single, equitable marketplace, empowering them with real-world insights and data to help them make better decisions. RedCloud enables FMCG Brands to seize new opportunities in emerging markets, facilitates access to more buyers & streamlines operations for Distributors, and helps Local Merchants spend more time selling products, not searching for them.

The company comprises a highly diverse, dynamic team of driven talented people from over twenty different countries, speaking multiple languages, with a physical footprint in Africa, Europe, and Latin America.

The role:

In this role, you will oversee daily interactions and ensure our customers receive exceptional service. You will also contribute to developing and implementing strategies that enhance customer satisfaction. Your efforts will be vital in driving continuous improvement in our support operations.

Responsibilities:
  1. Order Management:
    Establish communication between retailers and key distributors to ensure timely delivery of orders.
    Make outbound calls to retailers when their order status changes to 'Shipped' to confirm receipt, including line-item verification.
    Escalate complaints promptly when orders are not received to ensure swift resolution.
  2. Customer Support:
    Assist customers with troubleshooting and resolving issues related to their accounts and orders.
    Update customer information, ensuring accuracy of email addresses and complete physical addresses with landmarks.
    Act as an escalation point for complex customer issues, providing resolution and ensuring customer satisfaction.
    Analyze recurring issues and collaborate with relevant teams to implement process improvements or system enhancements.
  3. CRM and Communication Support:
    Provide support through incoming emails and WhatsApp via the CRM system.
    Execute outbound marketing campaigns to retailers using SMS, WhatsApp, and email.
  4. Threat and Dormant Management:
    Conduct outbound engagement calls to dormant retailers regarding current promotions and win-back campaigns to encourage repurchase from Red101.
    Capture the Voice of Customer (VOC) to identify churn reasons.
  5. Onboarding and KYC Verification:
    Review customer submissions for any discrepancies or inconsistencies.
    Follow up with customers to obtain accurate resubmissions when necessary.
  6. Process Development:
    Collaborate with management to design and refine customer support processes, ensuring they align with organizational goals and enhance the overall customer experience.
    Identify areas for improvement in the current support processes and develop actionable plans to implement changes.

Requirements:

· Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Communications, or a related field.
· English speaker
· 3-5 years of experience in customer support or customer success
· Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
· Ability to analyze data and develop actionable insights.
· Proficiency in customer support software and CRM systems.
· Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to handle challenging situations with empathy and professionalism.
· Based in São Paulo / BR

title: Principal Clinical Programmer (LATAM Homebased)
description:
Principal Clinical Programmer (LATAM Homebased)

Updated: January 31, 2025
Location: Brazil-Latin America - BRA-Home-Based
Job ID: 25001422

Syneos Health is a leading fully integrated biopharmaceutical solutions organization built to accelerate customer success. We translate unique clinical, medical affairs and commercial insights into outcomes to address modern market realities.

Job Responsibilities

  • Provides application administration and technical support as the subject matter expert on all core business packages, including but not limited to: Medidata, Rave, Oracle OC/RDC, Oracle Inform, SAS, and supplemental packages such as migration mentoring/review, reporting tools, custom functions, etc. Utilizes primary development tools and other supporting tools to design, write, validate, and maintain software to meet specifications in a timely and productive manner following standard development procedures.
  • Generates and maintains all required documentation including the development of specifications, coding, and validation efforts in support of annotated Case Report Forms (CRF)s, database creation, coding setup, edit check procedures, import setup and processing, export setup and processing, listings, and custom reports.
  • Monitors applications proactively for workflow alerts, system errors, performance issues and troubleshoot programming deliverable defects.
  • Performs system integrations activities, application updates, and user acceptance testing.
  • Serves on project teams to coordinate and lead development activities for clinical programming projects. Attends meetings, participates in discussions, uses an analytical approach to problem solving, focuses on deliverables, and provides constructive feedback. Keeps those responsible for project management informed of any issues that might impact project target dates, scope, or budget and escalates potential problems effectively and in a timely manner.
  • Ensures high quality deliverables by providing senior review of ’program level’/multi-study core deliveries for accuracy. Attends sponsor audits and assists with in-progress audits.
  • Provides leadership, mentorship, training, guidance, and support to other department members based upon expertise in specific skill sets.
  • Attends Quick Start Camps (QSCs) in the lead Clinical Programmer role for assigned studies.
  • Manages project resources, proactively alerting management of delivery and resourcing needs.
  • Assists with management of application vendors and serves as an initial escalation contact. Monitors vendor service level agreements (SLAs) and reports metrics to upper management.
  • Supervises the implementations of upgrades and new modules of remotely hosted vendors, acquiring all documentation and storing in the relevant areas.
  • Possesses and maintains a broad overall knowledge in the field of clinical programming and clinical data management.
  • Contributes towards the update of standard operating procedures and work instructions in line with department and company process and policy.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree, Master’s degree preferred, In lieu of Bachelor’s degree, equivalent related education and experience.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, both written and spoken.
  • Demonstrated experience in managing multiple priorities in a highly dynamic environment.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, and PowerPoint), email, and Voicemail.
  • Experience with programming languages, such as PL/SQL, SAS, C#, or VB preferred.
  • Ability to travel as necessary (up to 25%).

Additional Information:
Tasks, duties, and responsibilities as listed in this job description are not exhaustive. The Company may assign other tasks, duties, and job responsibilities. Equivalent experience, skills, and/or education will also be considered. The Company will determine what constitutes as equivalent to the qualifications described above.

At Syneos Health, we are dedicated to building a diverse, inclusive and authentic workplace. If your past experience doesn’t align perfectly, we encourage you to apply anyway.

Syneos Health is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, marital status, ethnicity, national origin, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.

title: ANALISTA DE BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE SENIOR
description:
Job description

A Funcional Health Tech é movida pela certeza de que a Saúde é o pilar principal da vida das pessoas, por isso quebramos barreiras para promovê-la de forma sustentável.

Para realizar nosso propósito, inovamos todos os dias unindo pessoas, tecnologia e dados para prover o ecossistema da saúde com soluções que gerem eficiência e sustentabilidade em toda a cadeia.

Aqui, você irá participar, de maneira direta ou indireta, da criação de novas soluções para os mais diversos serviços de saúde porque essa é a missão diária de todos nós na Funcional. Pesquisamos, criamos e fazemos acontecer, porque está em nosso DNA.


Main responsibilities

Sua missão como Analista de Business Intelligence Senior, será:

  • Responsável por toda atualização de dados gerados pelos produtos da Funcional;
  • Geração de insight para o negócio e acompanhamento de base para validações dos processos;
  • Criar métricas e KPIs para acompanhamento de informações e tomada de decisão;
  • Automatizar processos de forma estruturada para atualização de Dashboards;
  • Desenvolvimento de Dashboards, Reports e Ad-hocs;
  • Validação de relatórios - análise do dado.

Requirements and skills

Para isso, esperamos que você possua:

  • Experiência com Banco de dados, Visualização de dados e Power Bi – Tableau;
  • Experiência com Desenvolvimento de Dashboards/ Reports;
  • Conhecer SQL;
  • Conhecimento em Sales Force ou outras ferramentas de CRM será um diferencial;
  • Visualização de dados/Criação de dashboards;
  • Experiência na tradução da necessidade do cliente.

Additional information

Como é trabalhar aqui na Funcional Health Tech:

  • Nosso time é incrível, colaboramos e fazemos juntos para ir mais longe.
  • Nossa cultura é ágil e estamos em constante evolução.
  • Incentivamos o crescimento profissional e o desenvolvimento dos nossos colaboradores com diversas ações e encontros, através de plataforma de treinamentos e webinars mensais, além da “Baratona”, que é o nosso Hackathon interno.

A Funcional reconhece que a diversidade traz benefícios para o negócio e que um ambiente plural e colaborativo é propício para a inovação acontecer. Desta forma, nossas oportunidades abraçam todos os talentos, sem distinção de cor, raça, gênero ou qualquer condição de deficiência. Todos os talentos podem participar igualitariamente nos processos seletivos da Funcional. Venha fazer parte do nosso time!

REQUISITOS E QUALIFICAÇÕES

  1. Graduação em andamento em Administração, Marketing, ou áreas relacionadas;

INFORMAÇÕES ADICIONAIS

  1. Cultura de trabalho que respeita e valoriza as pessoas;
  2. Desenvolvimento de Carreira;
  3. Plano de Cargos e Salários com possibilidades horizontais e verticais;
  4. Premiação SEM TETO sobre metas atingidas;

ETAPAS DO PROCESSO

NOSSO JEITO DE SER?

Desde 2014, o Grupo Live One se destaca como uma empresa que valoriza o respeito pelas pessoas, parceria, inovação. Fundado em Campinas, interior de São Paulo, como parte de um grupo empresarial consolidado, crescemos rapidamente e contamos hoje com mais de 1000 colaboradores espalhados por mais de 10 estados do Brasil, que transformam desafios em conquistas todos os dias. Com orgulho de nossas realizações, recebemos, nos últimos dois anos, o selo internacional Great Place to Work (GPTW), reconhecendo nosso compromisso com um ambiente de trabalho acolhedor e colaborativo.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Programs Engineer - Plant Farley
description:
Engineer - Site Programs (Plant Farley)

Job Summary

Program Engineers direct implementation of assigned programs and work processes. Major programs include: Inservice Testing (IST), Appendix J, and Equipment Qualification (EQ). Program Engineers will be responsible for maintaining equipment reliability, ensuring regulatory compliance, knowledge and application of industry best practices, budgets, and for the performance or oversight of inspections of plant equipment. Also, Program Engineers will have key refueling outage assignments. Engineering assignments also include on-call duty engineer and emergency plan response requirements.

Educational Requirements

  • Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering from an ABET accredited program or PE License required
  • Mechanical or Civil Engineering discipline preferred

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities

  • A background in engineering with working knowledge of applicable discipline codes and standards.
  • An ability to solve problems and make sound engineering decisions based on experience and appropriate industry practices.
  • Previous experience in systems engineering, programs engineering, or component engineering preferred.
  • Experience and working knowledge of ASME Boiler & Pressure Vessel Code Section XI is a plus.
  • Working knowledge in Nuclear Plant Systems, structures and components preferred.
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills.
  • Proven organizational skills with ability to balance multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Capable of working efficiently and effectively across organizations.
  • Proficient in the use of Microsoft office products, specifically WORD, EXCEL and POWERPOINT.

Behavioral Attributes

  • Places highest priority on nuclear and industrial safety.
  • Accepts ownership of assigned programs, projects and tasks.
  • Develops strategy for optimum use of resources.
  • Self-motivated.
  • Uses rigor and formality when performing work to minimize errors.
  • Manages financial performance to control costs.
  • Works through conflicts to create win/win situations.
  • Holds self and others accountable for results.
  • Values diversity and respects the dignity of every individual.
  • Assumes personal responsibility for individual and company successes.

Job Identification: 9989

Job Category: Engineering

Job Schedule: Full time

Company: Southern Nuclear

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Gerente de Unidade JR
description:
Job description

A essência do cooperativismo é um modelo indiscutível de responsabilidade social. A cooperativa representa a união de pessoas que, movidas pelos mesmos ideais, agregam seus esforços – somando para que, ao final, possam dividir os resultados. Isto é o que acontece na Cocamar: a cooperativa conta com mais de 19 mil famílias de cooperados e cerca de 115 unidades operacionais espalhadas pelos estados do Paraná, São Paulo, Goiás, Mato Grosso e Mato Grosso do Sul.


Main responsibilities
  • Aprender como se engaja os colaboradores no atingimento de metas, desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional, assegurando o cumprimento de normas, trabalho em equipe, visando buscar melhor rentabilidade com bom clima organizacional, através de treinamentos, reuniões, confraternizações, premiações e feedback;
  • Conhecer o planejamento orçamentário de receitas, despesas e recebimento de produtos agrícolas, de acordo com os objetivos estratégicos da empresa, visando assegurar a viabilidade da unidade de produção;
  • Entender como funciona o relacionamento com cooperados e comunidades através de atendimentos, visitas, reuniões, eventos técnicos e confraternizações, visando a fidelização do cooperado e fortalecimento da imagem Cocamar perante a comunidade;
  • Acompanhar o monitoramento dos processos por meio de análise de indicadores gerenciais, propondo planos e ações necessárias visando assegurar o cumprimento das metas definidas pela alta direção;
  • Conhecer como é assegurada a qualidade dos produtos recebidos e armazenados, por meio de estrutura operacional da unidade e controles de termométricos;
  • Entender como a assistência técnica agronômica aos produtores com alta movimentação econômica com a cooperativa, é realizada pela equipe técnica da unidade;
  • Entender como o departamento técnico da unidade realiza dia de campo, palestras e visitas, implantação de áreas piloto e assistência técnica individual visando a implementação de novas tecnologias pelos produtores resultando em aumento da produtividade.

Requirements and skills

Graduação Completa em: Agronomia, Administração, Economia, Ciências Contábeis ou áreas afins;

CNH B;

Experiência em Gestão.


Additional information

Benefícios:

Salário Compatível com a Função;

Vale Alimentação;

Vale Refeição;

Vale Transporte;

Assistência Social;

Plataforma de Saúde e Bem-Estar - Zenklub;

Universidade Corporativa – Unicocamar.

Após Período de Experiência:

Plano de Saúde Unimed (Coparticipativo);

Plano Odontológico (Optativo);

Seguro de Vida;

Participação nos Resultados mediante o atingimento de metas;

Convênios de até 50% com universidades para cursos técnicos, graduação e pós-graduação, descontos em óticas, farmácias, entre outros.

title: Aplicador ABA - Estudante de Fonoaudiologia (oficina) - 20hrs Manhã - Praia Grande - SP
description:
Aplicador ABA - Estudante de Fonoaudiologia (oficina) - 20hrs Manhã - Praia Grande

Vaga: Aplicador ABA - Estudante de Fonoaudiologia. O Instituto Almai nasceu da união de profissionais da área da saúde, com ampla experiência profissional, que tem um sonho em comum: produzir mudanças significativas e duradouras na vida dos pacientes com diferentes transtornos de neurodesenvolvimento, impactando positivamente a família e a sociedade. Nosso diferencial é o tratamento humanizado, aliado à expertise em Análise do Comportamento Aplicado (ABA), onde são desenvolvidas as intervenções terapêuticas no paciente, além do acolhimento familiar.

Estamos buscando um Aplicador ABA para se juntar ao nosso time. O Aplicador ABA é responsável por implementar e monitorar intervenções baseadas na Análise do Comportamento Aplicada (ABA) para promover o desenvolvimento da comunicação, linguagem e habilidades sociais dos pacientes, colaborando com a equipe de fonoaudiologia e outros profissionais da equipe multidisciplinar.

Responsabilidades
  1. Auxiliar diariamente os fonoaudiólogos nos atendimentos personalizados, de acordo com o perfil e necessidades do paciente, voltados para a estimulação da fala, implementação de comunicação alternativa, reabilitação fonoaudiológica, avaliações/exercícios miofuncionais e aplicação/orientação dos treinos ABA, a fim de assegurar a evolução do paciente.
  2. Participar ativamente na elaboração do plano terapêutico individualizado, estabelecido pelo fonoaudiólogo, e auxiliar na execução dos atendimentos e avaliações clínicas.
  3. Registrar diariamente no drive da Unidade, em cada pasta do paciente, os objetivos e demandas trabalhadas, a fim de acompanhar sua evolução clínica, a serem aprovadas pelo fonoaudiólogo.
Conhecimentos Específicos

Cursando Ensino Superior em Fonoaudiologia.
Curso de aplicador ABA.

Horário: 07:50hrs às 12:00hrs
Local: R. Limeira, 725, Praia Grande/SP.

title: Coordenador de Obra - Nível Brasil - SP
description:
Explore mais vagas de Encarregado de obras em Todas as cidades ou cadastre seu currículo para futuras oportunidades em diversas áreas.

Informações da VagaDescrição

Coordenar a operação da obra, abrangendo todos os setores da obra, desde a área administrativa até os serviços de campo, a fim de alinhar as informações, evitando desvios e mantendo foco em suas atividades.

Acompanhar a produtividade da obra, através do acompanhamento de RDO (Relatório Diário de Obra) e planilhas de controle.

Acompanhar e controlar a frequência dos colaboradores.

Controlar os custos e resultados da obra, diariamente, através de ferramentas de gestão de resultado.

Realizar o controle de receita, através da análise e acompanhamento do boletim de medição emitido.

Gerenciamento de material em estoque, através da análise de relatório de inventário geral do estoque de EPIs e ferramentas.

Realizar reunião de análise crítica do contrato, reunindo toda a equipe de supervisão de campo e área administrativa.

Ministrar e participar de reuniões de SSMA (Segurança, Saúde e Meio Ambiente), com a equipe de liderança da obra, bem como com os representantes do cliente, apresentando os índices de evolução de IPARI (Identificação de Perigos e Aspectos, avaliações e controles de Riscos e Impactos Ambientais).

Participar de reuniões de produção com o cliente, posicionando o mesmo sobre o status da obra.

Buscar novos serviços ou contratos, sempre que há possibilidades, ofertando os serviços da empresa, enfatizando os resultados já obtidos com os serviços prestados, trazendo tecnologia e gestão de negócio.

Coordenar a implantação e revisão do SIG (Sistema Integrado de Gestão).

Realizar a avaliação de desempenho dos colaboradores, através do preenchimento da planilha de avaliação junto ao Planejamento e Supervisão.

Acompanhar e orientar as ações nos processos de mobilização e desmobilização de obras, ao iniciar ou finalizar uma obra ou contrato, seguindo os procedimentos da RIP para essas etapas.

Aplicar e fazer cumprir a missão, visão, valores e princípios da organização em sua área, bem como os procedimentos internos e políticas estabelecidas.

Praticar a liderança de pessoas, mobilizando os esforços das equipes subordinadas para o alcance dos objetivos e estratégias da organização.

Prestar atendimento e realizar outras atividades profissionais correlatas e inerentes ao cargo exercido, conforme orientação e/ou solicitação do superior imediato.

Buscar melhoria contínua dos processos, procurando identificar e eliminar desperdícios.

Desafiar crenças convencionais, a fim de promover mudanças necessárias.

Trabalhar em equipe, buscando a otimização total e não local (pensar no grupo).

Ser flexível, pois estruturas e políticas rígidas limitam o progresso.

Manter a disciplina para atender aos padrões de segurança, qualidade e produtividade.

title: AUX DE GUILHOTINA
description:
Auxilia na troca, preparação, ajuste e operação das máquinas Guilhotinas Mecânicas, realizando a inspeção das peças produzidas conforme o Procedimento Operacional Padrão (POP) e também dos equipamentos utilizados, produzindo perfis e partes das esquadrias. Mantém o local de trabalho organizado, conforme normas e procedimentos técnicos de qualidade, segurança e preservação do meio ambiente.

Responsabilidades:
  1. Diariamente recebe as orientações sobre a produção do dia, observando na realização das suas atividades as metas de produtividade e qualidade.
  2. Responsável pela operação de Corte das chapas em aço, alumínio e MDF, regulando-as e produzindo-as de acordo com a programação da produção.
  3. Realiza a conferência, ajuste, troca e regulagem de ferramentas quando necessário.
  4. Inspeciona a máquina antes de iniciar as atividades, verificando se está dentro das condições de trabalho.
  5. Abastece as máquinas guilhotina utilizando a Ponte Rolante para o transporte das chapas.
  6. Reaproveita as chapas sucateadas pelos setores e, caso não seja possível o reaproveitamento, é pesado e requisitado a retirada da mesma.
  7. Executa as lubrificações nas máquinas e equipamentos semanalmente, a fim de realizar a manutenção preventiva.
  8. Preenche documentos relacionados à identificação e qualidade do produto como a ficha de identificação e também o Controle Estatístico de Processo (CEP).
  9. Orientam auxiliares e novos operadores sobre o processo de corte de perfis, procedimentos relacionados à qualidade e produtividade pela qual a área é responsável.
  10. No caso de problema no produto, comunicar ao responsável pelo setor para abrir Relatório de Não Conformidade (RNC).
  11. Organiza o local de trabalho, conforme normas e procedimentos técnicos, de qualidade, segurança e preservação do meio ambiente.

description:
Aplicador ABA (Estudante de Fonoaudiologia) - 20hrs Manhã - São Vicente

Vaga: Aplicador ABA - Estudante de Fonoaudiologia. O Instituto Almai nasceu da união de profissionais da área da saúde, com ampla experiência profissional, que tem um sonho em comum: produzir mudanças significativas e duradouras na vida dos pacientes com diferentes transtornos de neurodesenvolvimento, impactando positivamente à família e sociedade. Nosso diferencial é o tratamento humanizado, aliado a expertise em análise do Comportamento Aplicado (ABA), onde são desenvolvidas as intervenções terapêuticas no paciente, além do acolhimento familiar.

Estamos buscando um Aplicador ABA para se juntar ao nosso time. O Aplicador ABA é responsável por implementar e monitorar intervenções baseadas na Análise do Comportamento Aplicada (ABA) para promover o desenvolvimento da comunicação, linguagem e habilidades sociais dos pacientes, colaborando com a equipe de fonoaudiologia e outros profissionais da equipe multidisciplinar.

Responsabilidades
  1. Auxiliar diariamente os fonoaudiólogos nos atendimentos personalizados, de acordo com o perfil e necessidades do paciente, voltados para a estimulação da fala, implementação de comunicação alternativa, reabilitação fonoaudiológica, avaliações/exercícios miofuncionais e aplicação/orientação dos treinos ABA, a fim de assegurar a evolução do paciente.
  2. Participar ativamente na elaboração do plano terapêutico individualizado, estabelecido pelo fonoaudiólogo e auxiliar na execução dos atendimentos e avaliações clínicas.
  3. Registrar diariamente no drive da Unidade, em cada pasta do paciente, os objetivos e demandas trabalhadas, a fim de acompanhar sua evolução clínica, a serem aprovadas pelo fonoaudiólogo.
Conhecimentos Específicos

Cursando Ensino Superior em Fonoaudiologia. Curso de aplicador ABA.

Horário

7h50 às 12h00

Local

Rua Santa Cruz, 134.

title: Director of Development (Open Until Filled)
description:
Director of Development (Open Until Filled)

Position : Director of Development (Open Until Filled)

The Silicon Valley Monterey Bay Council, Boy Scouts of America (SVMBC), a California 501(c)3 corporation, is the premier scouting organization in the Western United States and among the largest and most diverse in the nation. We create the leaders of tomorrow by empowering coed youth age 5-21 to live confident, capable, complete, and compassionate lives through dynamic leadership opportunities and fun outdoor adventures. Through our Cub Scouts, Scouts BSA, Venturing (high adventure programs), and Exploring (workforce development) program, SVMBC serves nearly 9,000 youth and young adults through more than 4,000 adult Scouting volunteers each year.

Our alumni are world renowned innovators, business leaders, explorers, military heroes, government officials, entrepreneurs, entertainers and good citizens who contribute to the fabric and prosperity of America and their communities. The staff team is a group of dedicated and diverse professionals committed to creating a better tomorrow for young people and our nation via the experientially transformative power of Scouting.

Our 2024 operating budget is $6M and we manage net assets of $43M. The organization is primed for considerable growth and is searching for a development leader who, in partnership with the CEO and board, can help propel our fundraising to the next level. The Director of Development is a senior leadership team member, leading a three-person department. In collaboration with the CEO, Vice President of Development, Vice President of Marketing, Vice President of Board Development and others, this position leads the execution of all direct fundraising events, strategies, solicitations, and donor relations.

Responsibilities
  • Works closely with the CEO/Scout Executive and the Board of Directors to pursue a coordinated and strategic program of annual operating and capital gift prospects and donors.
  • Responsible for raising $2.5 million in direct support annually.
  • Cultivate and manage an active portfolio of five, six, and seven-figure prospects through identification, research, solicitation and stewardship.
  • Implement a comprehensive annual giving strategy that includes personal solicitation, direct mail, institutional giving, and fundraising events management.
  • Recruit, train, inspire, and staff volunteer committees of fundraising events.
  • Document, contact, and strategize using the prospect tracking module of Blackbaud CRM.
  • Adhere to the policies and procedures for accepting, recording, and acknowledging gifts.
  • Participate as a member of the Leadership Cabinet and staff the Board Development Committee.
  • Support strategic operating plans for the council as directed by the CEO/Scout Executive; establish coordinated goals and implement programs to meet goals, development policies, and council priorities.
  • Lead the organization of, and participate in, council events to cultivate relationships with donors, prospects, key volunteers, and all internal partners.
  • Provide leadership to the development team and inspire colleagues and volunteers to assist in identifying new and improved ways to create revenue for the organization.
  • Pursue professional growth activities with the approval and support of the CEO/Scout Executive.
  • Occasional overnight travel to conferences, donor meetings and professional development events may be required.
  • Complete other duties as assigned.
Education and Qualifications

You have a proven track-record of fundraising leadership and revenue success. And you are rarely satisfied with the idea that doing it the way it has always been done is always the way to keep doing it. You have a bachelor’s degree from an accredited university or college, and eight years of experience in donor development, sales, business development or a similar field. Extensive knowledge of the Silicon Valley and Monterey County philanthropic market and Certified Fund-Raising Executive (CFRE) certification are preferred, but you know lots of people without that certification that are still fundraising rockstars. You meet Scouting’s leadership and membership standards and subscribe to the Scout Oath and Law. Prior experience in Scouting is not required.

You LOVE taking the initiative and creating bigger, better, faster and stronger results, and you thrive in a macro-management environment. You have never met a stranger and you jump at chances to engage in front of small groups and large. You have a tee-shirt that says “I love multitasking.” Or maybe you don’t, but it would describe you well. You can transition from zip-lining at Scout camp with a donor in the morning to donning evening attire for a formal dinner in Pebble Beach all in the same day. You communicate clearly and with confidence, and you understand how listening more than talking can be a powerful fundraising tool. You are bored if everyday is like the last and if you were a fighter jet pilot, your call-sign would be “adaptability.” You bring your A-game everyday and you want to be around other people like you.

PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES:

  • Integrity
  • Confidence
  • Excellent communication skills; written, oral, presentation skills. Can speak from the heart.
  • Strong organizational skills with ability to drive initiatives to closure.
  • Charisma and enthusiasm.
  • Establishes collaborative working relationships.
  • Open to coaching and taking direction.
  • Passionate about the Scouting mission.
  • Able to give focused attention to donors.
  • High energy level, which translates to enthusiasm on the job.
  • Must be a self-starter.

Silicon Valley Monterey Bay Council is an equal opportunity employer – if you have the talent and commitment, we want you to apply. In addition to offering a competitive salary, the position offers benefits to include major medical, prescription coverage, dental, vision, life-insurance, long-term disability, a matching 403(b) retirement plan, plus reimbursement for authorized and approved business expenses. We also offer a generous PTO policy starting at 18 days, maxing out at 30 and 12 paid holidays per year.

Salary Range: Salary commensurate and negotiable with skill and experience, in a hiring range of $120,000 to $140,000.

title: Desenvolvedora de Software (Vaga afirmativa exclusiva para mulheres), Intech
description:
Amazon.com's long-term vision is to enable a seamless global shopping experience for all Amazon customers worldwide on any Amazon website or device, in any language and for any culture. Our goal is to create software that offers customers a unique shopping experience that is internationalized for their preferences.

Our team is responsible for automating the launch strategy for Amazon's expansion into new countries. We build customer-facing features in a highly distributed environment that directly impacts Amazon’s e-commerce revenue in over 150+ countries.

About you:

You're looking for a career where you'll be able to build, to deliver, and to impress. You build customer-facing features that reach millions of new customers all over the world. You look at problems holistically and thrive on the intricate complexity of designing feedback loops and ecosystems. You want to work on projects where you are leveraging Machine Learning models to implement solutions to real problems that require creative and deep understanding of the problem space. You challenge yourself and others to constantly come up with better solutions. You work closely with the business to define the expansion strategy and figure out innovative solutions to help this thriving business continue its exponential growth.

About us together:

We're going to eliminate vendor complexity so they can make products available in any market place. Along the way, we're going to face seemingly impossible problems. We're going to argue about how to solve them, and we'll work together to find a solution that is superior to each of the proposals we came in with. We'll make tough decisions, but we'll all understand why. We'll be the dream team.

Basic Qualifications
  1. 3+ years of non-internship professional software development experience
  2. 2+ years of non-internship design or architecture (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems experience
  3. Experience programming with at least one software programming language
Preferred Qualifications
  1. 3+ years of full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations experience
  2. Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent

title: Tire Development Engineer Lead
description:
Requisition ID: 123727
Sponsorship Available: No
Relocation Assistance Available: No

Goodyear. More Driven.

At Goodyear, we are driven by innovation and a commitment to excellence. As a Tire Development Engineer Lead at Goodyear, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of tire technology. Goodyear is at the forefront of innovation, committed to developing high-performance tires that not only meet customer demands but also prioritize sustainability. Our tire development process integrates cutting-edge materials and advanced engineering techniques to create products that enhance safety, efficiency, and environmental responsibility.

Please submit your application with an English version of your resume.

About the Position
In this role, you will provide technical leadership and mentorship within the tire development team but will not have any direct reports. This role is crucial for driving the resolution of technical issues, coaching project teams, and leading the review of project strategies. You will promote collaboration within Global Technology and other functions such as Quality, Manufacturing, and Product Marketing, ensuring the integration of the latest technologies into tire development projects.
Location: Americana Plant, São Paulo, Brazil

Hybrid: 3 days onsite/week

Primary Responsibilities

  • Develop products, processes, and methods that meet internal and external customer requirements.
  • Coordinate team projects, resolve technical issues, communicate with customer contacts, and complete tire development projects.
  • Contribute to the manufacture of quality products and processes with a focus on reducing complexity and maintaining high standards.
  • Promote the use of new tools and concepts and define and communicate stretch or unique performance goals.
  • Mentor team members in areas such as product performance, application of appropriate tools and processes, tire and mold development, and product field results.
  • Serve as standards gatekeeper through participating in RMM processes and facilitate information exchange between teams.

Required Education and Experience

  • Mechanical Engineering degree (or relevant field), required.
    • Advanced degree, preferred.
  • 7+ years in product, material, or technology development roles.
  • 2+ years of demonstrable technical coaching and mentorship.
  • Significant, proven experience leading multiple technical projects.
  • Understanding of the Goodyear Product Creation Process (PCP) is preferred.
  • Microsoft Office proficiency (Power Point, Excel).
  • Fluent in English, required; Portuguese and Spanish preferred.

Skills and Abilities

  • Practical understanding of science and technology applied to the design and analysis of tires.
  • Ability to lead engineering teams in project execution using existing technology and standard methods.
  • Proficiency in statistical design and analysis, including cause and effect analysis and risk analysis.
  • Strong organization, communication, and experimentation skills.
  • Ability to develop clear and concise technical reports summarizing highlights and defining logical next steps.

Why Join Us?

At Goodyear, we are committed to innovation and excellence. Join our team to contribute to the future of tire technology and make a meaningful impact in the industry.

title: Technical Support Engineer 3 - Brazil
description:
We are Datadog's in-house product experts. The Technical Solutions team enables Datadog's worldwide growth by educating potential clients and ensuring that existing customers are happy and successful. We share our technical and product expertise with customers via multi-channel technical support, demos, and presentations. You’ll be joining a team and company where you will be challenged, but also will immediately witness your contributions to Datadog.

At Datadog, we place value in our office culture - the relationships and collaboration it builds and the creativity it brings to the table. We operate as a hybrid workplace to ensure our Datadogs can create a work-life harmony that best fits them.

What You’ll Do:
  • Engage with customers via multiple channels (ticketing system, live chat, and screensharing tools) to identify and resolve technical support requests while continuing to educate our clients on the use of the platform.
  • Reproduce technical issues and dive into Datadog’s 600+ integrations.
  • Handle urgent escalation cases that may result in customer-facing troubleshooting calls, and internal or external incident management.
  • Autonomously troubleshoot complex and/or high-priority customer issues.
  • Become a subject matter expert in many Datadog product areas.
  • Drive product conversations based on needs and problems learned during client interactions.
  • Lead high-complexity demos regarding specific and advanced use cases.
  • Provide mentorship to junior members of the team and serve as their escalation partner.
  • Work from a Datadog office 3 - 5 days per week.
Who You Are:
  • Experienced in multi-channel technical support at a SaaS company (5+ years of related experience).
  • Experienced with APIs, REST calls and an understanding of Network terminologies.
  • Experienced using Zendesk, Jira, Confluence, or similar software.
  • Familiar with one or more Cloud technologies.
  • An exceptional written and verbal communicator, with experience communicating complex technical issues to both technical and non-technical audiences.
  • A strong mentor to your technical peers.
  • A critical thinker who defaults to a client-centric approach.
  • Self-motivated, detail-attentive, and able to continuously learn.
  • Able to work a rotating schedule that requires weekend availability.
  • Fluent in English and Portuguese.

Datadog values people from all walks of life. We understand not everyone will meet all the above qualifications on day one. That's okay. If you’re passionate about technology and want to grow your skills, we encourage you to apply.

Benefits and Growth:
  • Best-in-breed onboarding.
  • Generous global benefits.
  • Intra-departmental mentor and buddy program for in-house networking.
  • New hire stock equity (RSUs) and employee stock purchase plan (ESPP).
  • Continuous professional development, product training, and career pathing.
  • An inclusive company culture, able to join our Community Guilds and Inclusion Talks.

Benefits and Growth listed above may vary based on the country of your employment and the nature of your employment with Datadog.

About Datadog:

Datadog (NASDAQ: DDOG) is a global SaaS business, delivering a rare combination of growth and profitability. We are on a mission to break down silos and solve complexity in the cloud age by enabling digital transformation, cloud migration, and infrastructure monitoring of our customers’ entire technology stacks. Built by engineers, for engineers, Datadog is used by organizations of all sizes across a wide range of industries. Together, we champion professional development, diversity of thought, innovation, and work excellence to empower continuous growth. Join the pack and become part of a collaborative, pragmatic, and thoughtful people-first community where we solve tough problems, take smart risks, and celebrate one another.

Equal Opportunity at Datadog:

Datadog is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer and is proud to offer equal employment opportunity to everyone regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, veteran status, and more. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.

Your Privacy:

Any information you submit to Datadog as part of your application will be processed in accordance with Datadog’s Applicant and Candidate Privacy Notice.

title: Analista de Testes Júnior
description:
Buscamos um(a)Analista de Testes Jr . para fazer parte do nosso time de qualidade, apoiando no planejando e execução dos testes que assegurarão um software confiável e alinhado às necessidades do cliente. Será responsável, principalmente, por documentar cenários e casos de teste, acompanhar indicadores de qualidade e identificar não conformidades. Além disso, contribuirá para a construção dos processos de QA, ajudando a reduzir falhas em todas as etapas do desenvolvimento.Se você é analítico, detalhista e quer crescer na área de QA, venha fazer parte do nosso time!

Responsabilidades e atribuições

  • Apoiar na execução de testes funcionais para validar funcionalidades e garantir a qualidade das entregas.
  • Auxiliar na criação e documentação de casos de teste, cobrindo cenários variados para assegurar a validação eficiente do software.
  • Identificar e registrar bugs, acompanhando sua resolução junto à equipe de desenvolvimento.
  • Colaborar com desenvolvedores e analistas de negócios para entender os requisitos do projeto e garantir que as entregas atendam às necessidades do cliente.
  • Realizar testes básicos de funcionalidade, usabilidade e desempenho, com orientação da equipe.
  • Auxiliar na realização de testes de regressão para evitar impactos em funcionalidades já existentes.
  • Apoiar na elaboração de relatórios sobre os resultados dos testes e na atualização de métricas de qualidade.
  • Contribuir com sugestões de melhorias para os processos de QA e boas práticas na área.
  • Aprender e se manter atualizado sobre metodologias e ferramentas de teste, especialmente dentro da Power Platform.

Requisitos e qualificações

  • Formação em andamento ou concluída em cursos da área de tecnologia, como Análise e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas, Engenharia da Computação, Ciência da Computação ou similares.
  • É essencial ter vontade de aprender, ser proativo e saber trabalhar bem em equipe.
  • Compreensão de metodologias ágeis (Scrum, Kanban) e sua aplicação no ciclo de desenvolvimento.

Requisitos desejáveis

  • Diferencial: Certificações em Testes de Software ou Power Platform.

- Custeio das provas das certificações
- Bonificação em caso de aprovação
- Bonificação conforme a complexidade da certificação

Trabalhamos da nuvem, em qualquer lugar.

Sobre a empresa

A SharePrime está a 11 anos no mercado como parceira da Microsoft, atuamos no fornecimento de soluções que irão cooperar com a transformação digital de nossos clientes, enfrentando desafios tecnológicos e proporcionando um ambiente de aprendizado constante.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Pessoa desenvolvedora typescript segmento financeiro senior
description:
Buscando projetos inovadores?

Então vem com a Mollica IT e encontre a oportunidade certa pra dar match!

Estamos em busca de profissionais inovadores e criativos, que tenham paixão em crescer, evoluir e aprender.

Buscamos profissionais para atuar em uma Instituição de Pagamentos recém-licenciada pelo Banco Central (BACEN) em fase final de desenvolvimento de uma tecnologia proprietária. Embora ainda estejamos em fase inicial de operação, temos grandes ambições de conquistar o mercado de forma ampla e inovadora!

Você encontrará também oportunidades reais de crescimento profissional e de construção de carreira em um ambiente dinâmico e desafiador!

Qual será a sua missão:
  • Implementar arquiteturas escaláveis e seguras para plataformas bancárias;
  • Desenvolver soluções baseadas em microsserviços utilizando TypeScript;
  • Otimizar esquemas e consultas do banco de dados PostgreSQL para desempenho e confiabilidade;
  • Colaborar com as partes interessadas para definir requisitos técnicos e alinhar soluções aos objetivos de negócio;
  • Documentar soluções técnicas e processos de desenvolvimento para garantir rastreabilidade e facilitar a transferência de conhecimento;
  • Realizar testes abrangentes para assegurar a conformidade com os padrões regulatórios e a resiliência dos sistemas financeiros;
  • Demais rotinas da área.

Estamos com 3 posições em aberto com os seguintes perfis:

Perfil 1: Pessoa Desenvolvedora (TypeScript / Líder):O que você precisa ter:
  • Obrigatório experiência profissional comprovada em desenvolvimento TypeScript;
  • Obrigatório experiência no segmento financeiro;
  • Obrigatório experiência com implementação de APIs REST;
  • Obrigatório experiência comprovada em liderar equipes de desenvolvimento software;
  • Excelentes habilidades de resolução de problemas e comunicação;
  • Obrigatório possuir notebook próprio;
  • Obrigatório graduação completa.
Perfil 2: Pessoa Desenvolvedora (TypeScript):O que você precisa ter:
  • Obrigatório experiência profissional comprovada em desenvolvimento TypeScript;
  • Obrigatório experiência no segmento financeiro;
  • Obrigatório experiência com implementação de APIs REST;
  • Obrigatório possuir notebook próprio;
  • Obrigatório graduação completa.
Para todas as posições será um Diferencial se você possuir:
  • Conhecimentos de GoLang;
  • Experiência com Temporal (motor de workflows) para orquestração de processos distribuídos;
  • Familiaridade com plataformas de nuvem (AWS, Azure ou GCP) e ferramentas de orquestração de contêineres, como Kubernetes;
  • Experiência com Open Policy Agent (OPA) para implementação de políticas de segurança e de processamento em microsserviços;
  • Experiência com arquiteturas orientadas a eventos e sistemas de mensagens (por exemplo, Kafka);
  • Conhecimento de melhores práticas de segurança em aplicações financeiras;
  • Experiência em design e implementação de arquiteturas baseadas em microsserviços.

Contratação: PJ

Prazo: Indeterminado

Local: Home Office - Aceitamos Pessoas Candidatas de todo o Brasil

Horário: Das 8h00 às 17h00
